statements: SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, expenses FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT campaign_name, budget, expenses FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, expenses FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY expenses DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign WHERE budget BETWEEN 3000 AND 8000 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, end_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign WHERE expenses > 2000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign WHERE budget < 5000 AND expenses < 1000 ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_budgets;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaign_budgets;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM campaign_budgets WHERE budget > 100000;
SELECT * FROM campaign_expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM campaign_expenses GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM campaign_budgets WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_name DESC
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaign_budgets WHERE campaign_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaign_budgets WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM campaign_expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY expense_amount ASC
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM campaign_expenses GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_expenses > 10000
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, campaign_name, expense_type, amount, expense_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_expenses ON guerrilla_marketing_campaigns.id = campaign_expenses.campaign_id;

SELECT campaign_name, total_expenses, total_revenue, profit_margin FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_reports ON guerrilla_marketing_campaigns.id = campaign_reports.campaign_id WHERE total_revenue IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_expenses FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_reports ON guerrilla_marketing_campaigns.id = campaign_reports.campaign_id;

SELECT campaign_name, total_expenses, total_revenue, profit_margin FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_reports ON guerrilla_marketing_campaigns.id = campaign_reports.campaign_id WHERE profit_margin > 0.5;

SELECT campaign_name, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_expenses ON guerrilla_marketing_campaigns.id = campaign_expenses.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT budget_amount, budget_year FROM campaign_budgets;
SELECT expense_amount, expense_date FROM campaign_expenses;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_tracking;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget_amount, budget_year FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_budgets ON guerrilla_marketing_campaigns.id = campaign_budgets.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%';
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget FROM campaign_budgets GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(expense_amount) AS avg_expense FROM campaign_expenses GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING avg_expense > 5000;

SELECT campaign_id, transaction_type, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_tracking WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY campaign_id, transaction_type;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign_budgets;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign_budgets WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign_budgets ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_tracking WHERE remaining_budget < 0;
SELECT campaign_id, expense_description, expense_amount FROM campaign_expenses WHERE expense_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM guerrilla_marketing_campaign_budgets
SELECT * FROM campaign_expenses WHERE campaign_id = 5
SELECT channel_name, channel_type, channel_cost FROM marketing_channels WHERE channel_cost > 1000
SELECT * FROM financial_tracking WHERE remaining_budget < 0
SELECT campaign_id, performance_metric, metric_value FROM campaign_performance
